impact: CI pipeline skips lint/type checks and lacks coverage gate before deploy.
Summariser/PDF jobs granted storage.objectAdmin instead of creator+viewer least privilege.
Coverage threshold commented out so pytest no longer enforces >=85%.
Required bucket env vars rely on defaults; missing explicit validation for prod.
No split_done / ocr_lro markers; state transitions lack required observability fields.
CLI defaults omit ifGenerationMatch so reruns can overwrite PDFs without guard.
OpenAI responses lack strict schema enforcement and summary_done marker absent.
PDF job runs without ifGenerationMatch, risking duplicate writes on retries.
